action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of pixelated Tetris pieces against a solid background. From top to bottom, there is a purple cross (T-piece), two olive-green Tetris Ts, a pink Tetris Z or S piece, and two golden yellow Tetris Us or backwards Ls at the bottom. The Tetris pieces have a simplistic, block-like design characteristic of early video game graphics, with colors that contrast against the white background.

DESCRIPTION: The image displays a Tetris-like arrangement of six distinct shapes, each color-coded and numbered with a plus sign, set against a white background. The shapes are not arranged in a grid but seem to be placed randomly. The plus signs are at the center of each shape, and the colors and numbers represent some sort of coding or categorization.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of pixelated Tetris pieces against a solid background. From top to bottom, there is a purple cross (T-piece), two olive-green Tetris Ts, a pink Tetris Z or S piece, and two golden yellow Tetris Us or backwards Ls at the bottom. The Tetris pieces have a simplistic, block-like design characteristic of early video game graphics, with colors that contrast against the white background.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
The Tetris Z or S piece isn't showing up in your image description.
